actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Practice&Procedure.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Practice and Procedure

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Precisa Calculating Machine Company, Incorporated.

summary.text: (sfac141 Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate (See H.R. 2100 as passed Senate for similar provisions)) Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named corporation in full satisfaction of its claims against the United States for losses resulting from the Internal Revenue Service's collection of tax deficiencies subsequently determined to be erroneous.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Precisa Calculating Machine Company, Incorporated.
